thread.section_title: CheapOair.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CheapOair.com | www.cheapoair.com | 2 of 245
thread.title: Amanda Partsch

author: Amanda Partsch
title: Amanda Partsch
text: This was my first time using CheapOair and it is the only travel site I will be using for future arrangements! I had to change my departing flight time shortly after booking, and it was so easy. I just called the number on my confirmation email and was able to speak with someone right away. It was fixed in minutes, without incurring any steep penalties/fees.
